enabled.name: Enable Positional Audio
enabled.hint: Enable integration with Mumble positional audio via the Link plugin

updateRate.name: Update Rate (ms)
updateRate.hint: How often to update position data to Mumble (lower values = more responsive but higher CPU usage)

audioRange.name: Audio Range
audioRange.hint: Maximum distance for positional audio in grid units (affects audio falloff)

scaleMultiplier.name: Scale Multiplier
scaleMultiplier.hint: Multiplier for converting FVTT coordinates to audio space (adjust if audio positioning feels wrong)

notifications.mumbleLinkNotFound: Mumble Link plugin not detected. Make sure Mumble is running and the Link plugin is enabled.
notifications.helperNotFound: Mumble Link Helper application not found. Please run the helper application to enable positional audio.
notifications.connected: Successfully connected to Mumble Link Helper
